parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sets number of simul weather layers, affects quality of simul weather clouds.

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value> The effect of this command seems to be persistent across the game instance, e.g. restarting a missing will not reset it.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''setSimulWeatherLayers''' layers

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> layers: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setSimulWeatherLayers]] 0; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Very flat clouds</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[simulCloudDensity]], [[simulCloudOcclusion]], [[simulInClouds]]
</value></part></template></root>
